law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 450, sec. 79, effective July 1, 1983. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 11, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1992b-54, 1992b-56, 1992b-57.
